results.name: Whos turn is it?
results.desc: Keep something visible for the players to see whose turn it is. The players should also be paying attention and planning what they will do in advance.

results.name: What happened last game?
results.desc: You might consider making a log.

results.name: What happens if armor matches penitration?
results.desc: If the total of the roll plus modifiers equals or exceeds the target's Armor Class (AC), the attack hits.
